name: Crazy Stunt Challenge
description:
Crazy Stunt Challenge offers crazy challenges on scary drive tracks that are sky-high. This off-road impossible path is made with ramps to do super fast car stunts and high jumps for endless driving adventure. Super car driving on dangerous roads is full of thrill and fun. Avoid impossible fall otherwise your luxury party limo will fall down from extreme heights.

Features:
- Real life stunt mania game
- Mid-air stunts and sky high driving tracks
- Luxury Vehicles with real stunt cars on impossible paths.
- Extreme car stunts and realistic car driving simulation
- Amazing tracks dangerous sharp turns with jumps and obstacles
- Powerful engine for acceleration for impossible car racing simulator experience
